DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : The aim study compare effect ciliary body training propose manufacturer accommodate IOLs patient motivation pseudoaccommodative ability standard intraocular lens ( SA60AT ) . Setting : Department Ophthalmology , Medical University Vienna . Methods : This randomize , control , examiner-masked study comprise 80 eye 40 patient underwent standard cataract surgery . Patients randomly assign `` motivate '' `` non-motivated '' ( control ) group . In motivated group , subject told take part special protocol improve near-reading ability cataract surgery instruct use near add least 3 month . Follow-up examination include best-corrected distance visual acuity ( VA ) , distance-corrected near VA , best-corrected near VA , defocus curve read speed , well pilocarpine- , cyclopentolate- nearpoint-induced IOL shift assess partial coherence interferometry .
